title: A Night Sky Matchup: Supermoon Vs. Meteors
teaser: This year's Perseid meteor shower may be hard to see because it coincides with a so-called supermoon. NPR's Linda Wertheimer talks to Caltech professor Mike Brown about the dueling celestial events.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
